head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths POPE, JOSEPH D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths POPE, JOSEPH D.

block.p: POPE--Joseph D., age 54, on February 28, 2005, following a sudden illness. Beloved husband of Elaine Monchak and father of Charles, Gus and Isaac. Cherished son of Michael Pope and the late Rosalyn Schumer. Also survived by Barbara Lisa Pope, Michele Pope, Jackson E. Dube and Ian Farrell; Barbara Illig Pope and Sally G. Pope. A partner in the law firm of Cohen Pope in New York City, Jody was a graduate of Columbia College and Columbia University Law School, a former law clerk to the Hon. Morris E. Lasker, U.S. District Court Judge, and a former Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York. A memorial service will be announced later. In lieu of flowers, please send contributions to moveon.org
